resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "dynamic_templates": [
            {
                "full_name": {
                    "path_match": "name.*",
                    "path_unmatch": "*.middle",
                    "mapping": {
                        "type": "text",
                        "copy_to": "full_name"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    document={
        "name": {
            "first": "John",
            "middle": "Winston",
            "last": "Lennon"
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)
